title: lmao this fucking community
body:
you bitch when we don't get a server skin then you bitch when we do get a server skin.
jfc idk why riot even bothers to do anything for you guys.

replies.body: I pray to God that you realize some day of how the world works. It's a company. Not a mother. If we are sick of their antics they lose possible/potential customers. Do you understand the problem yet?

> [{quoted}](name=VENI VIDI VICI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=i1kyf2jB,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-09-30T02:06:41.476+0000)
>
> I pray to God that you realize some day of how the world works. It's a company. Not a mother. If we are sick of their antics they lose possible/potential customers. Do you understand the problem yet?

yes, I do.
but that doesn't change the fact that the community is acting extremely self entitled.
nowhere did riot say the OCE server skin was going to be free, and you guys are acting like they did.
we just assumed it would be because the other servers got theirs for free.
They kinda did. There's a problem and they should fix it on their end. Lack of communication lead to it, therefore problem identified.

> [{quoted}](name=VENI VIDI VICI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=i1kyf2jB,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-09-30T05:41:55.693+0000)
>
> They kinda did. There's a problem and they should fix it on their end. Lack of communication lead to it, therefore problem identified.

but they didn't say anywhere at all that OCE would be getting their server skin for free.
yes, it was implied because others got theirs for free.
but that doesn't change the fact that they didn't say we would be getting ours for free.
Cause we're getting the shit end of the stick. They bother because they make dickloads of money from us (the consumers)

> [{quoted}](name=VENI VIDI VICI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=i1kyf2jB,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-09-30T02:01:33.121+0000)
>
> Cause we're getting the shit end of the stick. They bother because they make dickloads of money from us (the consumers)

yeah but would you rather get no stick at all?
